channel.title: Scar help...freezing/mouse not moving error?
channel.description:
I've fixed my previous error, however I have another one. Everything is set up 100%. EVERYTHING. No errors at all, and my cross hairs have been dragged
and I get
User specified a new RS window Successfully compiled Loaded 1 users from chars.srl Wrote 1 users to chars.srl There is 1 active users
BumSRL Fighter
however, runescape will freeze for 2 seconds, unfreeze for 5, free again for 2 sconds after that...for a little bit, and the mouse won't move anywhere?
I have the latest java installed, and I got the script to work once after restarting (I restarted again, and the script didn't work that time...) but it won't work.
I have no idea whats wrong... :S.

item.title: Scar help...freezing/mouse not moving error?
item.dc:creator: @sh4d0ws sh4d0ws
item.description:
@sh4d0ws wrote:

doomsday:

Its called, you are running something(like a color finder) and repeating it, and since you cant find the color, it lags like a bitch.

I don’t think so…a goblin killer that has auto colours lags like that too, so no, that cannot be it.

Read full topic

item.title: Scar help...freezing/mouse not moving error?
item.dc:creator: @sh4d0ws sh4d0ws
item.description:
@sh4d0ws wrote:

Scripts won’t work still…everybody disregard Surajd’s help, as that was froma previous error.

Bump…
and err… reread the original topic, it contains information…[br][size=1]Posted at: June 11, 2006, 11:32:11 pm[/size][hr]This is a bump and a edit…the logic in it

Anywho, bloodfighter, bumisfighter, and the goblin scheduler (all SRL) don’t work and freeze up, havent’ tested anything else but I have a feeling they won’t work either…fukin shit eh?

Read full topic

item.title: Scar help...freezing/mouse not moving error?
item.dc:creator: @Surajd Surajd
item.description:
@Surajd wrote:

You have a Firewall/AntiVirus program running which is blocking the program’s access.

Read full topic

item.title: Scar help...freezing/mouse not moving error?
item.dc:creator: @sh4d0ws sh4d0ws
item.description:
@sh4d0ws wrote:

I’ve fixed my previous error, however I have another one. Everything is set up 100%. EVERYTHING. No errors at all, and my cross hairs have been dragged

and I get

User specified a new RS window
Successfully compiled
Loaded 1 users from chars.srl

There is 1 active users

BumSRL Fighter

however, runescape will freeze for 2 seconds, unfreeze for 5, free again for 2 sconds after that…for a little bit, and the mouse won’t move anywhere?

I have the latest java installed, and I got the script to work once after restarting (I restarted again, and the script didn’t work that time…) but it won’t work.

I have no idea whats wrong… :S.
